Package org.apache.xpath.jaxp

Class Summary
JAXPExtensionsProvider  
JAXPPrefixResolver This class implements a Default PrefixResolver which can be used to perform prefix-to-namespace lookup for the XPath object.
JAXPVariableStack Overrides VariableStack and delegates the call to XPathVariableResolver.
XPathExpressionImpl The XPathExpression interface encapsulates a (compiled) XPath expression.
XPathFactoryImpl The XPathFactory builds XPaths.
XPathImpl The XPathImpl class provides implementation for the methods defined in javax.xml.xpath.XPath interface.
